attributes.action: Holiday Companies to provide clear financial staus reports
attributes.additional_details:
Any Company involved with the provision of making holiday bookings for people, including Hotels, Flights, Ferrys, Cruises and Villa accomodation are to provide clear and transparent current financial information indicating the companies ability to provide these services without going into liquidation.
This will help people decide on who to book holidays with and with reasonable assurances of that companies stability.
This will prevent 1000s of British people having the disapointed suffered like those who used Holidays 4 UK
